en.about.page.title: About VIBBIO Express
en.about.page.description: VIBBIO Express is our self-service solution for video production – where you CAPTURE & UPLOAD your content, and we ADD THE SMARTS and deliver a publish-ready video within days.
en.about.page.examples.title: Here are couple of examples*:
en.about.page.examples.format: *Our videos are always tailored to fit the idea and profile of each case, so these examples are just to show a few variations of the smart video format
about.page.smart.paragraph: Our team of producers and content specialists have lots of experience in how to create the ultimate smart videos. And this is knowledge we now implement in this new service!

Storytelling in a short format of maximum 1 minute can be challenging, but when done correctly, the reach and effect can be fantastic. Building engagement and visibility through portioning your content into short, specific episodes – collected into targeted and themed series, is a very smart video strategy – and can be added to over any suitable time period.

We specialise in tailoring our formats to fit any type of content – which includes implementing a full range of our smart tactics, including initial hook, text plaquards, suitable tempo & clip rate, and many more.
VIBBIOs smart videos are built specifically around new and proven patterns in how online audiences behave these days;
- What engages people, and makes them curious and attentive? Emotions are triggers!
- How long do they stay tuned? Our attention span has been measured to max 1 min 15 sec.
- 93% of videos seen on Facebook are watched without sound on.. So text everything!
- We scroll down a page in typically 3 seconds - so that is the time available to “hook” a viewer.
en.startpage.public.title: Welcome to VIBBIO Express!
en.startpage.public.video.text: You've probably heard by now, video is the future of communication. So, what's holding you back? Video is too expensive you say? No time to learn editing? Well hey, no need to worry! The answer is right in front of you. Your experiences, your stories, your knowledge. Simply capture with your smartphone and we'll do the rest. Engaging, short, texted, targeted. Videos tailor-made for you. With Vibbio Express you collect the content, we edit and add the smarts! So, don't waste your money or your time. Capture, upload, download, publish. It's video. Made easy.
en.startpage.public.description: VIBBIO Express is a self-service solution for video production – where you CAPTURE & UPLOAD your content, and we add the smarts and deliver a publish-ready video within days.
en.startpage.public.examples: We create short, texted and dynamic videos. Here are a couple of {examples}.
en.startpage.public.beta.description: PS: This application is currently in beta, which means that all the functionality is not finished. Therefore we would really appreciate your feedback on {link}.
